title: "Hey guys you know how morde has troubles fighting against ranged champs?"
body:
Yeah what about it?

For the rework let's throw him in the bot lane against the Champions he struggles against

And while we're at it let's take a fat shit on his shield values, but to make up for it he gets full xp for the minions he kills only after he puts a point in W though

But here's a real change for you, we'll let him get a slow clunky pet dragon that his team will never get because they'll have no dragon control due to being down an ADC. You have our Riot Spaghetti Coding™ guarantee that the pet dragon will be useless and buggy as shit

And you wanna know what the pièce de résistance, the true kicker in this rework that'll help him with those pesky ranged champions?
